title: FS - Tax Refund Monsters (206) - IRS Form 9206
author: frankbmd

posts.post_title: FS - Tax Refund Monsters (206) - IRS Form 9206
posts.post_content:
74.  Did you receive a Tax Refund?     Yes   O        No     O
75.  If yes, would you like to have your refund in
            a. Cash - Go to Question 80                              
            b. Cards - Go to 76                                           
76.  Please examine the menu below.

Shag Shaughnessy        SGC10SOLD    
Clark Griffiths (Portrait)PSA3SOLD      
Neal Ball                         BVG462.00        Holding butterfly
Jack Chesbro                R49.00        short, Hall of Fame
Frank “Home Run” BakerBVG1SOLD      
Al Burch (Batting)        R34.00        sovereign 150, paper loss
Tommy Leach (Bending)RSOLD  
Hobe Ferris                BVG228.00        glue? on back
Gus Dorner                RSOLD       
Harry Krause (Pitching)R20.00        right upper corner crease

77.  Notes
All prices include shipping.
Will discount for multiple cards in an order.
Check, money order or Paypal Gift (+3% if using PP with CC) accepted.
Go to [url]www.collectorfocus.com[/url] to see larger scans (/collection/frankbmd/duplicates)
Email [url]frank.burkett@gmail.com[/url] or PM if you have any questions.
May accept more or less than asking price.  You never know.;)
Beheaded cards are no longer available.:eek:

78.  Select the cards you want.

79.  Notify me and arrange for payment and provide address.

80.  Why don't you want cards?  Others are available as well at collector focus web site.
